name: Twin_Peaks_General_Store
text:
Twin Peaks General Store
Twin Peaks General Store was a general store in Twin Peaks.
History
On February 25, 1989, Nadine Hurley went to the store to buy cotton balls. There, she encountered Norma Jennings and told her that she planned on using the cotton balls to silence her drape runners.
Gallery
Showcase of the storeToy train station sold in a store
Behind the scenes
The shooting location was Valley Hardware Toys & Trains located at 612 Myrtle Avenue in Monrovia, California.
